title.rendered: “IDF Casualty Identified: Update on Sergeant Omer Sara Benjo and Other Injured Soldiers”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesperson regarding the name of the IDF casualty, which was given to her family: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC1402202428936523

In addition, attached is a link to the IDF website, where details and photographs of the casualties are published and updated: https://www.idf.il/59780

Furthermore, in the event in which Sergeant Omer Sara Benjo fell, a reserve soldier from the Communications Branch was severely injured. Additionally, other soldiers were injured at varying degrees in the incident.

All the soldiers were evacuated for medical treatment at a hospital and their families have been updated.
